name: Beechtree Capital
overview:
Beechtree Capital LTD was established by George Weiss in 1992 to strategically invest and advise in pervasive business opportunities. Since then Beechtree Capital has expanded their team to comprehensively work with companies who are seeking direction and capital within the new economy. Beechtree Capital and related investors have provided equity and debt investments in over 70 transactions involving more than 35 start-up and emerging companies. Total private and institutional debt and equity funding for these companies has exceeded $1 billion. Approximately 75% of our equity investments have been successful, resulting in approximately a 400% return to investors.

Through our advisory services Beechtree Capital has offered business planning and introduced financing to start up companies in fields ranging from data storage technology to fashion and consumer goods. As advisors with independent entrepreneurial and venture capital experience Beechtree is able to assess a situation and provide proven plans and techniques for success within an ever changing marketplace.

At Beechtree Capital we develop close and sustainable working partnerships with entrepreneurs and management teams who have demonstrated outstanding leadership capabilities. Through a team-oriented, management approach, Beechtree applies its broad financial and legal experience, industry knowledge, personal connections and methodologies to succeed in the face of business challenges.

Beechtree Capital has corporate offices in New York, New York, Phoenix, Arizona, and Park City, Utah.
